children.name: chromium
RequestOtp.spec.js
OTP Request Endpoint Validation
Negative Test Case: Should fail when Content-Type header is missing (Unexpected 200)
Scenario: Positive Test Case: Valid email requests OTP successfully (Expect Status: 200)
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Non-existent user email (Security check) (Expect Status: 200)
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Empty string email in request body (Invalid Check) (Expect Status: 422)
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Missing email in request body (Required Check) (Expect Status: 422)
Negative Test Case: Should fail with 404 Not Found for GET request (was expecting 405)
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Invalid email format (missing @) (Expect Status: 422)
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Email with max length (boundary test) (Expect Status: 200)
Security: Should enforce rate limiting (429 Too Many Requests)
VerifyOTP.spec.js
OTP Verification Endpoint Validation
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Missing email in request body (Required Check) (Expect Status: 422)
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Truly Invalid 6-Digit OTP code (e.g., non-existent code) (Expect Status: 403)
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Invalid email format (e.g., missing @) (Expect Status: 422)
Scenario: Positive Test Case: Valid Email and OTP Code (Expect Status: 200)
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Missing OTP code in request body (Required Check) (Expect Status: 422)
Scenario: Negative Test Case: Code from a different, non-requested user (Expect Status: 403)
UpdateUserInfo.spec.js
Update User Info API
should successfully update user info and return complete user object
should return 401 when no bearer token is provided
should return 401 when using an invalid bearer token
should return 400/422/404 when sending invalid payload types
should return error when required fields are missing
should return 422 when username is already in use

Rejects request with no or invalid token

Fail when invalid authorization token is provided

Fail when client_id is missing
Successfully connect to a valid client

ListAllClients.spec.js
List All Clients API
Should return 401 when Authorization header is missing
Should list all clients successfully
Should return 401 for expired bearer token
Should return 401 for invalid bearer token
Should return 405 for wrong HTTP method (POST instead of GET)
GetCurrentUserInfo.spec.js
Get Current User Info API
Should return 401 when using expired token
Should fetch current user info successfully
Should return 401 when Authorization header is missing
Should return 401 when using invalid token
